item.description:
Sunday Nite Dance Party at the The Free Spirit Cafe
341 Kelly Road, Vernon, CT 06066 (860) 644-9637

Age Ranges - 30's , 40's , 50's

* DRESS TO IMPRESS *

Next to Vernon Circle, Across from Angelino's Restaurant

FROM 84 EAST:
Take exit 64-65 for CT-30/CT-83
Turn Left at CT-83/Rte-83/Talcottville Rd

Turn Right at Kelly Road

Join Central CT Singles And Hundreds Of Local Singles

Dance The Night Away -Meet Someone Special And Party With Central CT Singles

“Singles Dances provide the opportunity to meet many local singles all in one place!
So if you dance, don't dance, or just want to party with other local singles and meet someone special,
and check out the next Central CT Singles Dance Party”


The Party starts at 7 pm and Rocks Until Midnight

SUMMER SPECIAL - Tickets are only $10
ONLINE ESPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $15 at http://www.CentralCTS...

Call Us at (860) 236-3343

Your Ticket Includes:

* Pizza Buffet *
* DJ Dance Music and Requests *
* Plenty of FREE Safe Parking *

CHECK OUT OUR ADS IN THE HARTFORD COURANT AND THE HARTFORD ADVOCATE

For Directions, visit http://maps.google.co...

Group Special - Half Price Tickets For Groups Of 10 or More
(only $ 5 per ticket) and Reserved Table(s) for your Group

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: SUNDAY Nite Dance Party at The Free Spirit Cafe Age Group 30's * 40's * 50's
